name: A GAME (VerminLord317) (VerminLord317)
description:
Imagine a peaceful world. Where the vile things have been done away with. Where the inhabitants live freely and happily, going about their days without worry, strife, or conflict. But the fate of that world is in your hands... This is where you come into play, to set into motion the gears of the future. How will the creatures of this world react? What will be the end of your story?...

Thanks for downloading this game! It was a fun project and I hope you enjoy it! If you have any suggestions or have problems or questions leave a comment! 

Consider donating, even though this game may not be much to behold, better things are sure to come! Well, better or worse... depending on what side of the screen you're on ;) . . .
